resources.string: Resets the clock to 00:00:00 and Tally to 20.
When you click Start, the stop watch starts ticking. It pauses when you click Stop and resumes when you click Start again. Whenever you Stop the Clock, the Tally and Score gets updated.

When you Stop, if the number represented by the last 2 digits is a Special Number, you get +5 points on your Tally. \nIf it is 25, 50, 75 (MileStones), you get +1, +2 and +3 respectively.\nIf it is not one of the above, your tally will be decreased by how far it is from the closest Special Number or a Milestone.
Score gets incremented by 1 each time you Stop without making the tally 0. The game ends when your Tally reaches 0. \nSome Sample Stops and the points awarded are shown below
